description: A whimsical take on aquatic finance.
title: Bank of the River
n_1: Gill wonders aloud about aquatic financial management.
c1_1: Ever ponder where we keep our money?
c2_1: Never really thought about it, why?
n_2: Finny, intrigued, swims closer to Gill, curious about the answer.
c2_2: And where's that, in a treasure chest?
n_3: Gill chuckles, ready to reveal the pun.
n_4: With a smirk, Gill delivers the punchline.
c2_4: Oh, I should've known. That's fin-tastic!
